description:
Speaking to an audience in Washington DC last week, Conservative Party leader Kemi Badenoch declared that the conservative desire to “protect the natural world” had been “hacked, replaced by a radical green absolutism”.  “Looking after our planet became an exclusive discussion about net zero and reducing emissions, and alongside it the growth of activist government […]

The post Kemi Badenoch’s Climate Denial Tour appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Kemi Badenoch’s Climate Denial Tour

description:
This investigation was coordinated by Le Monde and the nonprofit research organisation ARIA, in partnership with Transparency International EU and seven European media: De Tijd (Belgium), L’Espresso (Italy), der Spiegel and ZDF (Germany), der Standard (Austria), El Confidential (Spain) and DeSmog. An animal feed consultant, a farming union president, and a Big Dairy stalwart are […]

The post Revealed: The ‘Vested Interests’ on the EU’s Agriculture Committee appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Revealed: The ‘Vested Interests’ on the EU’s Agriculture Committee
